name: Entertainer
description: You thrive in front of an audience. You know how to entrance them, entertain them, and even inspire them.

feature.name: By Popular Demand
feature.description: You can always find a place to perform, usually in an inn or tavern but possibly with a circus, at a theater, or even in a nobleâ€™s court. At such a place, you receive free lodging and food of a modest or comfortable standard (depending on the quality of the establishment), as long as you perform each night.

traits.name: Skill Proficiencies
traits.description: You gain proficiency in the Acrobatics and Performance skills.

traits.name: Tool Proficiencies
traits.description: You gain proficiency with the disguise kit and one type of musical instrument.
